title: Android throws System.ObjectDisposedException: when returning to a page with Skia. UWP and iOS work fine
body:
### Description

Returning to a Page with a Skia Canvas in Android causes an exception
 System.ObjectDisposedException: Cannot access a disposed object.
 Object name: 'Xamarin.Forms.Platform.Android.Platform+DefaultRenderer'.
Both UWP and iOS work fine. I have a Master/Detail app with one page using SkiaSharp for drawing. Sometimes I need to go to a different page to get some info and then return to the drawing to continue with the Sketch. That is when, in Android, I get the Exception.
It starts with:
12-17 08:37:04.941 I/MonoDroid(12405): System.ObjectDisposedException: Cannot access a disposed object.
12-17 08:37:04.941 I/MonoDroid(12405): Object name: 'Xamarin.Forms.Platform.Android.Platform+DefaultRenderer'.

### Code

Below is a link to a repro.

### Expected Behavior

To move successfully between detail pages.

### Actual Behavior

Upon returning to the page with Skia I get System.ObjectDisposedException

### Basic Information

- Version with issue:  SkiaSharp v 1.68.0
- Last known good version:  new code, never run before
- IDE:  VS 2017 v 15.9.4
- Platform Target Frameworks: 
  - Android: 8.1 (Oreo) 

  -   Alcatel 9024O  Android v 7.1.1
 - Samsung SM-G960W Android v 8.0
